articles.author: Sam Dorman
articles.title: Pro-life doctors, leaders criticize study that purportedly casts doubt on abortion reversals
articles.description: Pro-life advocates responded en masse after media outlets portrayed abortion reversals as dangerous by promoting a study that's being described as "misleading" and "ethically bankrupt."
articles.content:
Pro-life advocates responded en masse after media outlets portrayed abortion reversals as dangerous by promoting a study that's being described as misleading and "ethically bankrupt."

articles.author: Joseph Wulfsohn
articles.title: Meghan McCain rips Tom Steyer during 'View' appearance: 'You bought your way' onto debate stage
articles.description: "The View" co-host Meghan McCain got very confrontational with billionaire Democratic donor Tom Steyer during his Friday morning appearance on the daytime talk show, particularly over his participation in the upcoming Democratic debate.
articles.content:
